## R Markdown

## 1. Install and load packages
```{r}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
```

## 2. Make penguins data set and look at dimensions
```{r}
penguins_data <- penguins
dim(penguins_data)
```

## 3. Look at the variable names
```{r}
names(penguins_data)
```

## 4. Look at number of individuals sampled at each island
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```

## 5. 
```{r}
mean(penguins_data$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```
